entry.content:
tracing æ˜¯ tokio å›¢é˜Ÿå‡ºå“çš„æ—¥å¿—å¤„ç†åº“ã€‚

tracing tracing_subscriber æœ‰æ”¹åŠ¨ï¼Œå®˜æ–¹åº“ç¤ºä¾‹å¥½åƒä¹Ÿä¸èƒ½æ­£å¸¸è¿è¡Œã€‚

è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ç›¸å½“äºæŒä¹…å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°æ–¹ä¾¿å¼€å‘è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯æŸ¥çœ‹ã€‚

å¤šç›®æ ‡è¾“å‡ºå…·ä½“å‚è€ƒå®˜æ–¹ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š fmt-multiple-writer

è¿™ä¸ªä»£ç ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œä½†å¤§ä½“å†™æ³•æ”¹åŠ¨ä¸å¤šï¼Œé€šè¿‡æŸ¥æ‰¾ doc.rs å¾ˆå®¹æ˜“ä¿®å¤ï¼š

ç”¨åˆ°çš„åº“

// Cargo.toml

[dependencies]
// Rustå›¢é˜Ÿå®˜æ–¹æ—¥å¿—é—¨é¢åº“
log = "^0"
// æä¾› warn! error! info! ç›¸å…³æ ‡å‡†é”™è¯¯è¾“å‡ºå®
tracing = "^0"
// æä¾›ä¸åŒè¾“å‡ºå±‚åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼Œä»¥åŠç”Ÿæˆæ³¨å†Œä¸­å¿ƒç»‘å®šå¤šä¸ªå±‚
tracing-subscriber = { version = "^0.3", features = ["fmt", "std"]}
// æä¾›éé˜»å¡çš„æ–¹å¼è¾“å‡ºæ—¥å¿—ï¼Œå¦‚å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶
tracing-appender = "^0"
// æä¾›æŒ‡å®šè¾“å‡ºå†…å®¹çš„é¢œè‰²
colored = "^2"

ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

use colored::Colorize;
use tracing_subscriber::{fmt, Registry};
use tracing_subscriber::prelude::*;

fn main() {
  // æ—¥å¿—é…ç½®åˆå§‹åŒ–
  // è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ¥æ”¶ guard å¦åˆ™æ–‡ä»¶è¾“å‡ºå†…å®¹ä¼šæ˜¯ç©ºçš„
  let _guard = init_log();
  // æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç æ‰§è¡Œ
  run();
}

fn run() {
  // è¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨logåº“çš„é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯ tracingä¸ä¼šæ”¶é›†
  log::error!("æ— è§†logé”™è¯¯");
  // tracingç›¸å…³æ ‡å‡†ä¿¡æ¯è¾“å‡º
  tracing::warn!(
    "Tracing è­¦å‘Šä¿¡æ¯ {} {}",
    "è“è‰²æ–‡æœ¬".blue(),
    "çº¢è‰²æ–‡æœ¬".red()
  );
  tracing::error!("Tracing é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯!!");
}

///
/// æ—¥å¿—é…ç½®åˆå§‹åŒ–
///
fn init_log() -> tracing_appender::non_blocking::WorkerGuard {
  // æ ‡å‡†æ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å‡ºlayer
  let fmt_layer = fmt::layer()
    // æŒ‡å®šæ ‡å‡†æ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å‡º
    .with_writer(std::io::stdout);

  // æ–‡ä»¶ appender æŒ‡å®šæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶è¾“å‡ºç›®å½•å’Œæ–‡ä»¶åå‰ç¼€ 
  // daily æŒ‡å®šç”Ÿæˆæ–‡ä»¶åæ—¥æœŸåˆ°å¹´æœˆæ—¥
  // å¦‚ï¼š test-log.2023-08-30
  let file_appender = tracing_appender::rolling::daily("target/", "test-log"); 
  // ç”Ÿæˆéé˜»å¡å†™å…¥å™¨
  let (non_blocking, guard) = tracing_appender::non_blocking(file_appender);
  // æ–‡ä»¶è¾“å‡ºå±‚
  let file_layer = fmt::layer()
    // ç§»é™¤è¾“å‡ºå†…å®¹ä¸­çš„ é¢œè‰²æˆ–å…¶å®ƒæ ¼å¼ç›¸å…³è½¬ä¹‰å­—ç¬¦
    .with_ansi(false)
    .with_writer(non_blocking);

  // ç”Ÿæˆæ³¨å†Œä¸­å¿ƒ Registry ç»‘å®šå¤šä¸ªè¾“å‡ºå±‚
  let collector = tracing_subscriber::registry()
    .with(file_layer)
    .with(fmt_layer);
  
  // è®¢é˜…è€…å…¨å±€æ³¨å†Œ
  tracing::subscriber::set_global_default(collector).expect("Tracing collect error");

  guard
}

entry.title: Rust Poem å…±äº«ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ•°æ®åˆ° GraphQL
entry.content:

// graphql schema
let schema = build_schema().await;
// è¯·æ±‚ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€æ•°æ®
let state = State {
      schema,
      // åˆå§‹çš„ç©ºæ•°æ®ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ Option ç±»å‹
      req_ctx: init_default_req_ctx(),
};
// poemåº”ç”¨åˆå§‹åŒ–
let app = Route::new()
      // ç»‘å®šgraphql è·¯ç”±

      // æƒé™æ£€æµ‹ä¸­é—´ä»¶

      // å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯å’Œè¯·æ±‚ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ•°æ®æ•´ç†
      .with(CtxMiddleware)

Poem ä¸­é—´ä»¶æ•°æ®å¤„ç†

è‡ªå®šä¹‰ Context ä¸­é—´ä»¶ï¼Œä¸»è¦å¯¹å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯å’Œè¯·æ±‚ä½“å‚æ•°æ ¼å¼åŒ–

/// reqä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ³¨å…¥ä¸­é—´ä»¶ åŒæ—¶è¿›è¡ŒjwtæˆæƒéªŒè¯
pub struct Context;

impl<E: Endpoint> Middleware<E> for Context {
    type Output = ContextEndpoint<E>;

    fn transform(&self, ep: E) -> Self::Output {
        ContextEndpoint { inner: ep }
    }
}

/// Endpoint for `Tracing` middleware.
pub struct ContextEndpoint<E> {
    inner: E,
}

#[poem::async_trait]
impl<E: Endpoint> Endpoint for ContextEndpoint<E> {
    type Output = E::Output;
    // type Output = Response;

    async fn call(&self, req: Request) -> Result<Self::Output> {
        // Httpå…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€æ•°æ®è·å–
        let mut state: Option<State> = None;

        {
            if let Some(state_data) = req.extensions().get::<State>() {
                state = Some(state_data.clone());
            }
        }

        // è¯·æ±‚ä¿¡æ¯ctxæ³¨å…¥
        let auth_token = get_request_auth_token(&req);

        // è§£æJWT TOKEN
        let login_info= decode_jwt(
            auth_token.as_str(),
            !gql_is_public_query
        ).unwrap();
        
        // ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„è¯·æ±‚ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ•°æ®
        let req_ctx = ReqCtx {
            ori_uri: if path_params.is_empty() { ori_uri_path } else { ori_uri_path + "?" + &path_params },
            path,
            path_params,
            method: method.clone(),
            login_info,
            data: body_data.clone(),
            gql_operation_name,
            gql_variables,
            gql_trimmed_query,
            gql_is_public_query,
        };

        // ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„ Requestå¯¹è±¡
        let mut req = Request::from_parts(req_parts, Body::from(bytes));

        if let Some(state) = state {
            // ç§»é™¤æ—§çš„å…¨å±€Stateæ•°æ®
            req.extensions_mut().remove::<State>();
            // ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„ State
            let new_state = State {
                schema: state.schema.clone(),
                req_ctx,
            };
            req.extensions_mut().insert(new_state);
        }

        // å¼€å§‹è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®
        self.inner.call(req).await
    }
}

ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ•°æ®æ³¨å…¥åˆ°graphql

#[handler]
pub async fn graphql(
    data: Data<&State>,
    gql_req: GraphQLRequest,
) -> GraphQLResponse {
    let mut gql_req = gql_req.0;
    let schema = data.0.schema.clone();

    // å°† poem ä¸­ç”Ÿæˆè¯·æ±‚ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡è½¬å…¥ graphql
    gql_req = gql_req.data(data.0.req_ctx.clone());

    schema.execute(gql_req).await.into()

#[derive(Clone, Debug)]
pub struct NodeBody {
    pub nid: String,
    pub summary: String,
    pub summary_format: String,
    pub body: String,
    pub body_format: String,
}

#[Object]
impl NodeBody {
    async fn nid(&self) -> &str {
        self.nid.as_str()
    }
    async fn summary(&self) -> &str {
        self.summary.as_str()
    }
    async fn body(&self) -> &str {
        self.body.as_str()
    }
    async fn body_format(&self) -> &str {
        self.body_format.as_str()
    }
}

// å®ç° From ç‰¹å¾
impl From<&CoreNodeBody> for NodeBody {
    fn from(nb: &CoreNodeBody) -> Self {
        Self {
            nid: String::from(&nb.nid),
            summary: String::from(&nb.summary),
            summary_format: String::from(&nb.summary_format),
            body: String::from(&nb.body),
            body_format: String::from(&nb.body_format),
        }
    }
}

pub async fn find_nodes(
    db: &DatabaseConnection,
    category: &str,
    filters: &Vec<String>,
    order_name: &str, // created_at
    order_dir: &str, // DESC
    offset: i32,
    limit: i32,
) -> Result<Vec<Node>> {
    let mut query = CmsNodes::find()
        .select_only()
        // æŒ‡å®šä¸»è¡¨å­—æ®µ
        .columns([
            cms_nodes::Column::Nid,
            cms_nodes::Column::Vid,
            cms_nodes::Column::Bundle,
            cms_nodes::Column::Title,
            cms_nodes::Column::Viewed,
            cms_nodes::Column::Deleted,
            cms_nodes::Column::Deleted,
            cms_nodes::Column::PublishedAt,
            cms_nodes::Column::CreatedBy,
            cms_nodes::Column::UpdatedBy,
            cms_nodes::Column::CreatedAt,
            cms_nodes::Column::UpdatedAt,
            cms_nodes::Column::DeletedAt,
        ])
        // æŒ‡å®šå…³è”è¡¨å­—æ®µ
        .column_as(cms_node_body::Column::Summary, "summary")
        .column_as(cms_node_body::Column::Body, "body")
        .column_as(cms_node_body::Column::BodyFormat, "body_format")
        .column_as(cms_taxonomies::Column::Tid, "tid")
        .column_as(cms_taxonomies::Column::Vid, "category_vid")
        .column_as(cms_taxonomies::Column::Name, "category_name")
        .column_as(
            Expr::col((Alias::new("cu"), sys_users::Column::Uid)),
            "author_uid"
        )
        .column_as(
            Expr::col((Alias::new("cu"), sys_users::Column::Username)),
            "author_username"
        )
        .column_as(
            Expr::col((Alias::new("cu"), sys_users::Column::Nickname)),
            "author_nickname"
        )
        .column_as(
            Expr::col((Alias::new("uu"), sys_users::Column::Username)),
            "updated_by_username"
        )
        .column_as(
            Expr::col((Alias::new("uu"), sys_users::Column::Nickname)),
            "updated_by_nickname"
        )
        .join(
            JoinType::LeftJoin,
            CmsNodes::belongs_to(CmsNodeBody)
                .from(cms_nodes::Column::Nid)
                .to(cms_node_body::Column::Nid)
                .into()
        )
        .join(
            JoinType::LeftJoin,
            CmsNodes::belongs_to(CmsNodeTaxonomiesMap)
                .from(cms_nodes::Column::Nid)
                .to(cms_node_taxonomies_map::Column::Nid)
                .into()
        )
        .join(
            JoinType::LeftJoin,
            CmsNodeTaxonomiesMap::belongs_to(CmsTaxonomies)
                .from(cms_node_taxonomies_map::Column::Tid)
                .to(cms_taxonomies::Column::Tid)
                .into(),
        )
        // å…³è”ç”¨æˆ·è¡¨ æŒ‡å®šåˆ«å cu åˆ›å»ºè€…ä¿¡æ¯
        .join_as(
            JoinType::LeftJoin,
            CmsNodes::belongs_to(SysUsers)
                .from(cms_nodes::Column::CreatedBy)
                .to(sys_users::Column::Uid)
                .into(),
            Alias::new("cu"),
        )
        // å…³è”ç”¨æˆ·è¡¨ æŒ‡å®šåˆ«å uu æ›´æ–°è€…ä¿¡æ¯
        .join_as(
            JoinType::LeftJoin,
            CmsNodes::belongs_to(SysUsers)
                .from(cms_nodes::Column::UpdatedBy)
                .to(sys_users::Column::Uid)
                .into(),
            Alias::new("uu"),
        )
        .filter(
            Condition::all()
                .add(cms_nodes::Column::Deleted.eq("0"))
                .add(cms_nodes::Column::Bundle.eq("article"))
        );

    query = query.order_by_desc(cms_nodes::Column::CreatedAt);

    // ç”ŸæˆæŸ¥è¯¢sql
    let sql = query.clone()
        .build(DbBackend::Postgres)
        .to_string();

    println!("sql-----: {:?}", sql);
    // è·å–å…¨éƒ¨æ•°æ®æ¡æ•°æ®
    let total = query.clone().count(db).await?;
    // åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢å¹¶å°†ç»“æœè½¬ä¸º DetailNode æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
    let pager = query
        .into_model::<DetailNode>()
        .paginate(db, limit as usize);
    let total_pages = pager.num_pages().await?;
    let list = pager.fetch_page(offset as usize).await?;

    println!("list-{:?} total:{:?}  taotal_page: {:?}", list, total, total_pages);

    Err(anyhow!(""))
}

ç”Ÿæˆçš„sql

SELECT 
"cms_nodes"."nid", "cms_nodes"."vid", 
"cms_nodes"."bundle", "cms_nodes"."title", 
"cms_nodes"."viewed", "cms_nodes"."deleted", 
"cms_nodes"."deleted", "cms_nodes"."published_at", 
"cms_nodes"."created_by", "cms_nodes"."updated_by", 
"cms_nodes"."created_at", "cms_nodes"."updated_at", 
"cms_nodes"."deleted_at", 
"cms_node_body"."summary" AS "summary", 
"cms_node_body"."body" AS "body", 
"cms_node_body"."body_format" AS "body_format", 
"cms_taxonomies"."tid" AS "tid", 
"cms_taxonomies"."vid" AS "category_vid", 
"cms_taxonomies"."name" AS "category_name", 
"cu"."uid" AS "author_uid", 
"cu"."username" AS "author_username", 
"cu"."nickname" AS "author_nickname", 
"uu"."username" AS "updated_by_username", 
"uu"."nickname" AS "updated_by_nickname" 
FROM "cms_nodes" 
LEFT JOIN "cms_node_body" 
      ON "cms_nodes"."nid" = "cms_node_body"."nid" 
LEFT JOIN "cms_node_taxonomies_map" 
      ON "cms_nodes"."nid" = "cms_node_taxonomies_map"."nid" 
LEFT JOIN "cms_taxonomies" 
      ON "cms_node_taxonomies_map"."tid" = "cms_taxonomies"."tid" 
LEFT JOIN "sys_users" AS "cu" 
      ON "cms_nodes"."created_by" = "cu"."uid"
LEFT JOIN "sys_users" AS "uu" 
      ON "cms_nodes"."updated_by" = "uu"."uid" 
WHERE 
      "cms_nodes"."deleted" = '0'
      AND "cms_nodes"."bundle" = 'article' 
ORDER BY "cms_nodes"."created_at" DESC

entry.content:
sha2 æ˜¯ SHA-2 åŠ å¯†ç®—æ³•æ ‡å‡†çš„Rustå®ç°

SHA-2æ ‡å‡†ä¸­è§„å®šäº†6ç§æ ‡å‡†ç®—æ³•: Sha224, Sha256, Sha512_224, Sha512_256, Sha384 å’Œ Sha512ã€‚

æ ¸å¿ƒç®—æ³•æ˜¯ SHA-256 å’Œ SHA-512ã€‚å…¶å®ƒç®—æ³•éƒ½æ˜¯åŸºäºæ ¸å¿ƒç®—æ³•å¯¹å€¼è¿›è¡Œä¸åŒç²¾åº¦çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œå‰ä¸¤ä¸ªåŸºäºSHA-256ï¼Œåå››ä¸ª åŸºäºSHA-512ã€‚

ç”¨åˆ°çš„åº“

  • sha2 åŠ å¯†ç®—æ³•
  • chrono æ—¥æœŸæ—¶é—´æˆ³

åŠ å¯†ç¤ºä¾‹

// éœ€è¦å¼•å…¥ Digest ç±»å‹
use sha2::{Sha256, Digest};
use chrono::prelude::*;

fn main() {
    // è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´æˆ³ ç§’
    let timestamp: i64 = Utc::now().timestamp();
    // æ—¶é—´æˆ³ æ¯«ç§’
    // let timestamp_millis: i64 = Utc::now().timestamp_millis();
    // ç¤ºä¾‹åº”ç”¨ID
    let app_key = "hello-world";

    // è¦åŠ å¯†çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²: app_key + timestamp
    let str_source = format!("{}{}", app_key, timestamp);

    // ä½¿ç”¨ Sha256 åŠ å¯†ç®—æ³•
    let mut hasher = Sha256::new();
    hasher.update(str_source.as_str());

    // GenericArray<u8>
    let result = hasher.finalize();
    // GenericArray è½¬ä¸º 16è¿›åˆ¶å°å†™å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
    let res = format!("{:x}", result);

    println!("{} -> {}", str_source, res);
}

entry.title: Rust slugify
entry.content:
å°†ä»»ä½•unicodeå­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬ä¸ºè¯­ä¹‰åŒ–çš„asciiç ï¼ˆæ–¹ä¾¿åšå®¢ä¸€ç±»åº”ç”¨ä¸­æ“ä½œæ–‡ä»¶åæˆ–URLé“¾æ¥ï¼‰ã€‚

ç”Ÿæˆçš„slugä¼šä¿ç•™ a-zã€0-9å’Œä¸­åˆ’çº¿ï¼ˆ-ï¼‰ã€‚æ­¤å¤–ä¸ä¼šå­˜åœ¨ä¸¤ä¸ªè¿ç»­çš„ä¸­åˆ’çº¿ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸ä¼šä»¥ä¸­åˆ’çº¿ å¼€å¤´æˆ–ç»“å°¾ã€‚

ä¸»è¦ç”¨åˆ°çš„åº“ï¼š

  • slugåº“
  • deunicode
  • regex
  • once_cell

ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

assert_eq!(
    slugify_paths_without_date("My Test String!!!1!1"),
    "my-test-string-1-1"
);
assert_eq!(
    slugify_paths_without_date("2016-08-17-æ­£æ–‡å†…å®¹æŒ‰æ¢è¡Œç”¨æ ‡ç­¾åŒ…è£…"),
    "zheng-wen-nei-rong-an-huan-xing-yong-biao-qian-bao-zhuang"
);
assert_eq!(
    slugify_paths_without_date("2015-07-17-ç§»åŠ¨é¡µé¢åŸºæœ¬ç»“æ„"),
    "yi-dong-ye-mian-ji-ben-jie-gou"
);

åŠŸèƒ½å®ç°

å‚è€ƒzolaä¸­çš„ä»£ç åŠŸèƒ½ç®€åŒ–ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼š

use regex::Regex;
use once_cell::sync::Lazy;
use std::path::Path;

// æ­£åˆ™åˆ†è§£æ–‡ä»¶åä¸­çš„æ—¥æœŸ
// Based on https://regex101.com/r/H2n38Z/1/tests
// A regex parsing RFC3339 date followed by {_,-} and some characters
pub static RFC3339_DATE: Lazy<Regex> = Lazy::new(|| {
    Regex::new(
        r"^(?P<datetime>(\d{4})-(0[1-9]|1[0-2])
            -(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])(T([01][0-9]|2[0-3]):([0-5][0-9])
            :([0-5][0-9]|60)(\.[0-9]+)?(Z|(\+|-)([01][0-9]|2[0-3])
            :([0-5][0-9])))?)\s?(_|-)(?P<slug>.+$)"
    ).unwrap()
});

/// ç»“æ„åŒ–æ–‡ä»¶å
/// æ‹†åˆ†ä¸ºè·¯å¾„ã€æ–‡ä»¶åã€åç¼€
pub struct CapturedFile {
    // æ–‡ä»¶å‰ç¼€è·¯å¾„
    pub parent: String,
    // æ–‡ä»¶å
    pub file_stem: String,
    // åç¼€
    pub ext: String,
}

impl CapturedFile {
    /// å°†æ–‡ä»¶åç»“æ„è½¬ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
    pub fn stringify(&self) -> String {
        if !self.file_stem.is_empty()
            && !self.ext.is_empty()
            && !self.parent.is_empty()
        {
            return format!("{}/{}.{}", self.parent, self.file_stem, self.ext);
        }

        if !self.file_stem.is_empty()
            && !self.ext.is_empty()
        {
            return format!("{}.{}", self.file_stem, self.ext);
        }

        String::from(&self.file_stem)
    }
}

/// å°†æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„è½¬ä¸ºç»“æ„åŒ–æ•°æ® CapturedFile
fn capture_file_name(s: &str) -> CapturedFile {
    let valid_str = s.replace("\\", "/");
    let p = Path::new(&valid_str);

    let mut parent = String::new();
    let mut file_stem = String::new();
    let mut ext = String::new();

    if let Some(parent_path) = p.parent() {
        parent = parent_path.to_str().unwrap_or("").to_string();
    }
    if let Some(stem) = p.file_stem() {
        file_stem = stem.to_str().unwrap_or("").to_string();
    }
    if let Some(extension) = p.extension() {
        ext = extension.to_str().unwrap_or("").to_string();
    }

    CapturedFile {
        parent,
        file_stem,
        ext,
    }
}

/// è¯­ä¹‰åŒ–æ–‡ä»¶åå¹¶å»é™¤æ–‡ä»¶åçš„æ—¥æœŸ
pub fn slugify_paths_without_date(s: &str) -> String {
    let mut captured_file = capture_file_name(s);
    let mut file_path = String::from(captured_file.file_stem.as_str());

    // æ­£åˆ™åŒ¹é…åŒ…å«æ—¥æœŸçš„æ–‡ä»¶å æ— æ—¥æœŸåˆ™ä¸ä¼šåŒ¹é…
    if let Some(caps) = RFC3339_DATE.captures(file_path.as_str()) {
        if let Some(s) = caps.name("slug") {
            file_path = s.as_str().to_string();
        }
    }
    // å°†unicodeè½¬ä¸ºascii
    let res_slug = slug::slugify(file_path.as_str());
    // æ›´æ–°æ–‡ä»¶åä¸º slug
    captured_file.file_stem = res_slug;
    captured_file.stringify()
}
